title: [Windmill Burrow, Oatmeal Street]
description: The road curves around a massive pine on the northern side.  Snow hangs heavily from its branches, and every breeze produces a spray of flakes.  On the porch of a small home facing the tree, a tubby old halfling smokes his pipe, grinning up at the sun.

The road curves around a massive pine on the northern side.  Snow hangs heavily from its branches, and every breeze produces a spray of flakes.  On the porch of a small home facing the tree, a tubby old halfling smokes his pipe, grinning up at the moon.
